alert.note: Alert for Inland Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 5:16PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Nassau, western Camden and northeastern Charlton Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 516 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kings Ferry, or 8 miles east of Folkston, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Kings Ferry, Winokur and Tarboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
